description.value:
Level 4 Abjuration

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: undefined touch

Components: V, S, M (a leather strap)

Duration: 1 hour

You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target's movement is unaffected by Difficult Terrain|XPHB, and spells and other magical effects can neither reduce the target's Speed|XPHB nor cause the target to have the Paralyzed|XPHB or Restrained|XPHB conditions. The target also has a Swim Speed|XPHB equal to its Speed|XPHB. In addition, the target can spend 5 feet of movement to automatically escape from nonmagical restraints, such as manacles or a creature imposing the Grappled|XPHB condition on it.

At Higher Levels: You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 4.
